text: "Sweet Thing" or "Sweet Thing/Candidate/Sweet Thing (Reprise)" is a suite of David Bowie songs from his eighth studio album Diamond Dogs. They were the third fourth and fifth tracks from the album and was recorded in January 1974. ==References== Category:1974 songs Category:David Bowie songs Category:Art rock songs Category:Glam rock songs
title: Sweet Thing (David Bowie song)
